goal.en: This course aims to teach the legal norms related to artificial intelligence, as well as related issues related to the development and application of artificial intelligence. Issues, including intellectual property rights, data utilization, development contracts, ethical guidelines, AI crimes and crime hotspots, privacy, civil liability of unmanned vehicles/autonomous vehicles, medical care, and judicial applications, etc. It basically covers the current development of artificial intelligence and legal issues, so that students can anticipate the problems that artificial intelligence may face in the future of science and technology and rethink legal norms.
goal.ch: 本課程旨在講授與⼈⼯智慧相關的法律規範，以及涉及⼈⼯智慧發展與應⽤的相關議 題，包括智慧財Ԣ權、資料利⽤、開發契約、倫理準則、AI犯罪與犯罪熱區、隱私權、無⼈載具/⾃駕⾞的民事責任、醫療以及在司法上的應⽤等。基本上涵蓋⽬前⼈⼯智慧發展與法律議題，使學⽣能在科技未來預想到⼈⼯智慧可能⾯臨的難題與對法律規範之再思考。

content.en:
.1 Artificial Intelligence, Society and Law: Introduction Development and Application of Artificial Intelligence, Legal Issues
2 Artificial Intelligence and Technology Law System Information Network Law
3 Artificial Intelligence and Intellectual Property Rights (1): Works, authors, AI creations, AI author subjects
4 Artificial Intelligence and Intellectual Property Rights (2): Copyright, AI Fair Use, Copyright Infringement
5 Artificial intelligence and intellectual property rights (3): patent rights, trademark rights, AI patentability, AI trademark search
6 Artificial Intelligence and Data Utilization (1): Personal Data Protection Regulations, Personal Data Protection Principles and Data Acquisition Methods for Artificial Intelligence Development
7 Artificial Intelligence and Data Utilization (2): Data Cooperation Contract, a contractual cooperation model between data providers and users
8 Artificial Intelligence Development Contract: Related contract matters for entrusted development of artificial intelligence
9 Artificial Intelligence and Corporate Ethics: The Impact of Sustainable Development Goals and Corporate Social Responsibility on Industrial AI
10 Artificial Intelligence and Criminal Law (1): Cybercrime, Types of AI Cybercrime and Criminal Law
11 Artificial intelligence and criminal law (2): crime hotspots and the regulation of AI in criminal procedures, AI prediction of crime hotspots and legal issues
12 Artificial Intelligence and the Constitution: Information Privacy and Reasonable Expectations, Basic Concepts of Privacy and Protection Standards
13 Artificial Intelligence and Technological Innovation of Unmanned Vehicles: Development and Legal Regulations, Experimental Regulations on Technological Innovation of Unmanned Vehicles, Civil Law/Consumer Protection Law
14 Artificial intelligence and medical care (1): Review of software medical equipment, risk management of artificial intelligence-related medical software.
15 Artificial Intelligence and Medical Care (2): Product Responsibility and Professional Responsibility, Responsibility Standards for the Introduction of Artificial Intelligence into the Medical Process
16 Speeches on the Application of Artificial Intelligence in Judicial Practice: Examples of Artificial Intelligence Application in Various Countries
17 General Discussion: Artificial Intelligence Governance and the Legal Future of Human Subjects, Final Report or Final Exam
18 Final report or final exam
content.ch:
1 ⼈⼯智慧、社會與法律：導⾔⼈⼯智慧的發展及其應⽤、法律議題
2 ⼈⼯智慧與科技法體系資訊網路法
3 ⼈⼯智慧與智慧財產權（⼀）：著作、著作⼈、AI創作物、AI著作⼈主體
4 ⼈⼯智慧與智慧財產權（⼆）：著作權、AI合理使⽤、著作侵權
5 ⼈⼯智慧與智慧財產權（三）：專利權、商標權、AI可專利性、AI商標檢索
6 ⼈⼯智慧與資料利⽤（⼀）：個資保護法規，個資保護原則及⼈⼯智慧開發之資料取得⽅式
7 ⼈⼯智慧與資料利⽤（⼆）：資料合作契約，資料提供者與利⽤者間之契約合作模式
8 ⼈⼯智慧開發契約：⼈⼯智慧委託開發之相關契約事項
9 ⼈⼯智慧與企業倫理：永續發展⽬標及企業社會責任對產業AI化之影響
10 ⼈⼯智慧與刑事法（⼀）：網路犯罪、AI網路犯罪類型與刑法
11 ⼈⼯智慧與刑事法（⼆）：犯罪熱區與AI在刑事程序的規範、AI預測犯罪熱區及法律議題
12 ⼈⼯智慧與憲法：資訊隱私與合理期待、隱私權基本概念與保護標準
13 ⼈⼯智慧與無⼈載具科技創新：發展與法律規範、無⼈載具科技創新實驗條例、民法/消保法
14 ⼈⼯智慧與醫療（⼀）：軟體醫療器材之審核，⼈⼯智慧相關醫療軟體之⾵險管理
15 ⼈⼯智慧與醫療（⼆）：產品責任與專業責任，⼈⼯智慧導⼊醫療過程之責任規範
16 ⼈⼯智慧在司法實務上的應⽤：各國⼈⼯智慧應⽤實例
17 綜合討論：⼈⼯智慧治理與⼈主體的法律未來、期末報告或期末考
18 期末報告或期末考
